history.action: Refused to concur in Senate amendments
Insist on amendments; asks for committee of conference
Conference managers: Reps. - Oelslager, Butler, Cera
Conference managers: Sens. - Dolan, Burke, O'Brien: Conference Committee on H.B. 166
Conference report agreed to: Conference Committee on H.B. 166
Effective 7/18/19 - Operating appropriations and tax levy generally effective July 18, 2019. Other provisions generally effective October 17, 2019. Some provisions subject to special effective dates.
